column5: Sail has ammo on sale 20% off for black Friday.   As well as most everything in the store.   Let' just say the wife was not impressed when I got home to tonight....I told her I saved a bunch of money in the future.   She wasn't buying it.

He he yes I to am a confessed hoarder of ammo. I like to  shoot and between the calibers of the rifles and pistols I have last count was around 8000 rounds. Hope this helps you out of the doghouse.   Art
You ready for the Zombie Apocalyse????
The ammo prices haven't seem to come back down to where they were before Obama threatened stricter gun control. I think there is a lot of hoarders out there, lol.

It is a shame really but you have to buy in bulk now if you like to shoot. A simple .17 HMR is 22 cents if you buy a box of 50 but buy 5 boxes and it goes down to .16 cents.  The larger caliber have gotten to the point that it is worth reloading an round bigger than a .308. The .50 cal. is just insane at $3.50 if you bulk buy 200 rounds or better.  Art
Happens here too,  gun sales soared when the long gun registry was scrapped and again when the Liberals took power, I suspect ammo followed the same trend.
